channel.title: Why do i disconnect when i attack an npc?
channel.description: Everytime I go to attack an NPC i Disconnect Does anyone know how i can prevent this from happening? Would realy apprechiate it and you wouldnt be wasting your time if you helped me. :)

item.title: Why do i disconnect when i attack an npc?
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

This happens to me too on my new DeltaScape source server.

My only guess is it’s got to be another anti-leech.

  • RuneX -

Read full topic
